about_the_game:
Airborne Arena is a racing-shooter game where you take the role of "The Prodigy", a hoverbike rider tasked with infiltrating in the gangs of 2058's Rider City.
Sink deep into a new reality where you control a hoverbike with natural head movements freeing your hands for an action-packed FPS VR shooting experience.

Airborne Arena mixes some of the best elements of the most adrenaline-inducing racing games with an engaging rail-shooter like gun combat.

  • Unlock more than 20 different tracks in the Story Mode.
  • Increase your reputation to upgrade your V-bike and weapons.
  • Beat the 4 different Gang Leaders in special Boss Races.
  • Compete against friends in multiplayer races and deathmatch arenas.
  • Dig deep into Rider City's Lore voice-talking with the different NPI (Non-playable intelligence) characters.
  • Become the most legendary Viker in the whole of Rider City.

content_descriptors.notes:
Low-Poly graphics violence.
Shooting, Blood, Explosions.
Story includes mentions to drug-trafficking and usage.
Mentions to Gang-violence.
AI characters are trained not to engage in harmful or hateful topics but may be interpreted as mature content in their discuassions.

detailed_description:
Airborne Arena is a racing-shooter game where you take the role of "The Prodigy", a hoverbike rider tasked with infiltrating in the gangs of 2058's Rider City.
Sink deep into a new reality where you control a hoverbike with natural head movements freeing your hands for an action-packed FPS VR shooting experience.

Airborne Arena mixes some of the best elements of the most adrenaline-inducing racing games with an engaging rail-shooter like gun combat.

  • Unlock more than 20 different tracks in the Story Mode.
  • Increase your reputation to upgrade your V-bike and weapons.
  • Beat the 4 different Gang Leaders in special Boss Races.
  • Compete against friends in multiplayer races and deathmatch arenas.
  • Dig deep into Rider City's Lore voice-talking with the different NPI (Non-playable intelligence) characters.
  • Become the most legendary Viker in the whole of Rider City.
legal_notice:
Effective Date: 01/29/2024

1. Introduction

Welcome to Airborne Arena, a product of Fireborne Games ("we", "us", or "our"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a secure online experience. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information in accordance with Steam's requirements.

2. Consent

By using Airborne Arena, you consent to the data practices described in this policy. If you do not agree with any part of this policy, please do not use our application.

3. Collection of Information

Airborne Arena collects no information.

4. Data Storage and Security

We do not store any personal information on our servers. All data is processed in real-time and is only used for the intended purposes as stated above.

5. Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do not share, sell, rent, or trade any of your personal information with third parties for their promotional purposes.

6. User Control and Uninstallation

If you wish to prevent any data collection through Airborne Arena, you have the option to uninstall the application. Uninstalling will cease all data processing activities related to our application on your device.

7. Changes to the Privacy Policy

We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so please review it frequently. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon their posting on the website.

8. Contact Us

For any questions or concerns regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at firebornegames@gmail.com

By using Airborne Arena, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Privacy Policy.
name: Airborne Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ntel(R) Core(TM) i5-9400F CPU @ 2.90GHz 2.90 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 Series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built In
  • VR Support: Rift, Vive, Quest 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 7800 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built In
  • VR Support: Quest 3

Linguagem imprópria
Drogas ilícitas
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: Airborne Arena is a shooter-racing game set in 2058's Rider City. Enter an action-packed new reality filled with deadly hoverbike races, as you take the role of "The Prodigy" and infiltrate the different Viker gangs in the story mode or challenge your friends to online races and deathmatch arenas.
